00034 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00035 #include "TShapeOrientB1.hpp"

00038 #include "TMPCommon.hpp"

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00042 std::string TShapeOrientB1::get_name() const
00043   { return "TShapeOrientB1"; }
00044 
00045 TShapeOrientB1::~TShapeOrientB1() {}
00046 
00047 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00048 bool eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, double& result )
00049 {
00050   const double tau = det(T);
00051   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00052     result = 0.0;
00053     return false;
00054   }
00055   result = 0.5/tau * (Frobenius( T ) - trace(T)/DimConst<DIM>::sqrt());
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00061 bool grad( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00062            double& result, 
00063            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv )
00064 {
00065   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00066   const double invroot = 1.0/DimConst<DIM>::sqrt();
00067   const double tau = det(T);
00068   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00069     result = 0.0;
00070     return false;
00071   }
00072   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00073   const double invnorm = 1.0/norm;
00074   
00075   result = 0.5*inv_tau*(norm - invroot * trace(T));
00076 
00077   deriv = invnorm * T;
00078   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv, -invroot );
00079   deriv *= 0.5;
00080   deriv -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00081   deriv *= inv_tau;
00082   return true;
00083 }
00084 
00085 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00086 bool hess( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& T, 
00087            double& result, 
00088            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv, 
00089            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>* second )
00090 {
00091   const double norm = Frobenius(T);
00092   const double invroot = 1.0/DimConst<DIM>::sqrt();
00093   const double tau = det(T);
00094   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00095     result = 0.0;
00096     return false;
00097   }
00098   const double inv_tau = 1.0/tau;
00099   const double invnorm = 1.0/norm;
00100   
00101   const double f = norm - invroot * trace(T);
00102   result = 0.5 * inv_tau * f;
00103 
00104   const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00105   deriv = invnorm * T;
00106   pluseq_scaled_I( deriv, -invroot );
00107   deriv *= 0.5;
00108   deriv -= result * adjt;
00109   deriv *= inv_tau;
00110   
00111   const double a = 0.5 * inv_tau * invnorm;
00112   set_scaled_outer_product( second, -a*invnorm*invnorm, T );
00113   pluseq_scaled_I( second, a );
00114   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, f*inv_tau*inv_tau*inv_tau, adjt );
00115   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, -0.5*f*inv_tau*inv_tau, T );
00116   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invnorm, T, adjt );
00117   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product_I( second, 0.5*inv_tau*inv_tau*invroot, adjt );
00118   return true;
00119 }
